name: FinancialProduct
description: A product provided to consumers and businesses by financial institutions such as banks, insurance companies, brokerage firms, consumer finance companies, and investment companies which comprise the financial services industry.
title: FinancialProduct

fields.name: annualPercentageRate
fields.title: annualPercentageRate
fields.description: The annual rate that is charged for borrowing (or made by investing), expressed as a single percentage number that represents the actual yearly cost of funds over the term of a loan. This includes any fees or additional costs associated with the transaction.

fields.name: interestRate
fields.title: interestRate
fields.description: The interest rate, charged or paid, applicable to the financial product. Note: This is different from the calculated annualPercentageRate.

fields.name: feesAndCommissionsSpecification
fields.title: feesAndCommissionsSpecification
fields.description: Description of fees, commissions, and other terms applied either to a class of financial product, or by a financial service organization.
